name: Glitch Lab
description:
Exploit bugs and hack your way through the level!

Credits:
Music by Nick Dolan
Art by Eris on opengameart
Code and design by me (nazywam)
(It was my entry to glitchjam jam)
vHae nfu! :)

Controls:

Use wsad/arrows and space. 

Press 'm' to mute the game, and -/+ to change volume.
